capabilities.name: connect-ssh
capabilities.description: Connect to an Ubuntu server via SSH with predefined credentials

capabilities.name: execute-command
capabilities.description: Execute a command on the remote Ubuntu server

capabilities.name: execute-command-tty
capabilities.description: Execute a command on the remote Ubuntu server with TTY support (for interactive commands)

capabilities.name: upload-file
capabilities.description: Upload a file to the remote Ubuntu server

capabilities.name: download-file
capabilities.description: Download a file from the remote Ubuntu server

capabilities.name: view-command-log
capabilities.description: View the history of commands executed on the remote Ubuntu server
